item.description:
Welcome to my website! I am a second year PhD student in Finance at Columbia Business School. I am interested in the financial stability and efficiency implications of recent trends in financial intermediation. I am also studying the environmental and social impact of corporations.

I’m originally from the Washington D.C. area. In 2018 I graduated from the University of Toronto withÂ a BSc in math and economics, and a newfound appreciation for Canada. I enjoy trying to make sense of the world.
